attributes.action: right to vote main election for Europeans who pay taxes and live 10yrs+ in UK
attributes.additional_details:
That problem is very frustrating for all of us as if you live for a long time here you want to have a positive say to better our community
To feel listen 
This is also why you have such big difference in the local vote as Europeans can vote then
It really make an unbalance image of Britain: u kip! Conservative in power ...how !
This is why . And  for some party it is a very convenient way to keep power .it is Injust for the other parties and UK citizens
attributes.background:
I am French, live in the UK since 1982 worked married and had children here
I can vote in France but don't feel it is relevant 
I cannot vote for the main election here as i kept my nationality
Every European had same problem so election isn't representative of the population and their needs
